text: Need Daniel Martinez for Priceline campaign. Budget around $3,556, looking for 2 x TikTok video, 3 x 5-minute review, 3 x Instagram story, 1 x Instagram reel, 1 x TikTok video. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
